vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezk.1.3;
father of: Ezekiel (H3168H)
§ Buzi = "my contempt"
father of Ezekiel (or ancestor)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Buz; (b)   padre del profeta Ezequiel
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
布西：我的輕蔑
1) 以西結之父（或祖先）(結1:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
布西：我的轻蔑
1) 以西结之父（或祖先）(结1:3)
